## examples of plotly

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
```

```{r}
data("rest_inspec")

```

```{r}

rest_inspec =
  rest_inspec %>%
  filter(grade %in% c("A", "B", "C"), boro != "Missing") %>% 
  mutate(boro = str_to_title(boro))
```


```{r}
rest_inspec %>% 
   plot_ly(x = ~cuisine_description,  color= ~grade , colors = "viridis")
```
